turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm looking to place a Starbucks order for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. what drink would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Today, I'm going to go ahead and have a venti cinnamon shortbread latte with coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. got it. would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll be it for me today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that drink iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds delicious. so to confirm, you would like a venti iced cinnamon shortbread latte with coconut milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what starbucks would you like to place this order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking to get pickup at the 2361 Monroe Road location in Bellevue, Wisconsin.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you want a venti iced cinnamon shortbread latte with coconut milk to be picked up at starbucks at 2361 monroe road in bellvue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like this order placed now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your drink has been ordered. It will be ready for pick up in 10 minutes.
